com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors

Class Visitors

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors.Visitors

  • public final class Visitors
extends Object
    Utility class for working with FlowVisitors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FlowVisitor<Action> getDefault()
      Obtain the default FlowVisitor, which constructs an Action which can be executed.
      static FlowVisitor<Action> logging(FlowVisitor<Action> wrapped)
      Wrap a FlowVisitor which constructs an Action which can be executed, decorating it with logging behaviour that writes messages to the console.
      static FlowVisitor<Action> logging(FlowVisitor<Action> wrapped, FlowLogger logger)
      Wrap a FlowVisitor which constructs an Action which can be executed, decorating it with logging behaviour.

      • logging

        public static FlowVisitor<Action> logging(FlowVisitor<Action> wrapped,
                                          FlowLogger logger)
        Wrap a FlowVisitor which constructs an Action which can be executed, decorating it with logging behaviour.
        Parameters:
        wrapped - The wrapped FlowVisitor.
        logger - The FlowLogger to use to log Flow and Condition execution.
        Returns:
        The logging FlowVisitor.

      • logging
